description: Replacement of first floor window to front elevation; replacement of two first floor side windows; installation of side gate
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s):
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building. The window and gate replacements hereby approved shall also match in respect of their colour, opening style and hinge detailing. Their rebate and frame thickness shall be as per the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
